mapper.select: SELECT master_product_id, ma_cuon_ton, ten_san_pham, loai_cuon, bh_phai_mau, bh_an_mon, total_weight, total_length, m_a_length, m_b_length, m_c_length, master_prod_type_id, status, noted, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, is_deleted FROM master_product WHERE master_product_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT master_product_id, ma_cuon_ton, ten_san_pham, loai_cuon, bh_phai_mau, bh_an_mon, total_weight, total_length, m_a_length, m_b_length, m_c_length, master_prod_type_id, status, noted, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, is_deleted FROM master_product WHERE is_deleted = 0
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM master_product WHERE master_product_id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0 )
SELECT COUNT(master_product_id) FROM master_product WHERE is_deleted = 0

SELECT w.u_warranty_id, w.user_id, w.latitude, w.longitude, w.address01, w.address02, w.address03, w.address04, w.address05, w.country_code, w.ma_cuon_ton, w.from_warranty_phai_mau, w.to_warranty_phai_mau, w.from_warranty_an_mon, w.to_warranty_an_mon, w.status, w.noted, w.created_at, w.created_by, w.updated_at, w.updated_by, w.is_deleted,
p.u_product_id, p.ten_san_pham, p.loai_cuon, p.bh_phai_mau, p.bh_an_mon, p.total_weight, p.total_length, p.m_a_length, p.m_b_length, p.m_c_length
FROM u_product p LEFT JOIN u_warranty w ON w.ma_cuon_ton = p.ma_cuon_ton AND w.is_deleted = 0 WHERE p.ma_cuon_ton = #{maCuonTon} LIMIT 1
